title: The Villainess Is Being Doted on by the Crown Prince of the Neighboring Country - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Broken Engagement   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   European Ambience   Fairies   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Marriage   Multiple POV   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Nobles   Otome Game   Politics   Pregnancy   Reincarnated in a Game World   Royalty   Timid Protagonist   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Puni-chan   ぷにちゃん
description:
Tiararose was supposed to be disengaged and exiled from the country.

“This was the Otome game I had played!” She realized on the day before the story’s ending――…….

Shall I wait for the judgment? But, I did not do anything too cruel… Thinking so, the ending continues.

But, during the judgement――something that was not possible in the game happened. The neighboring crown prince courted the villainous daughter Tiararose.>
